JustFashionNow is an online fashion shopping platform featuring independent fashion designers. We are committed to providing shoppers with original, high quality, and exclusive fashion products from independent designers.

We bring together designers and fashion covering many different styles. We hope that every one of our customers will find their own unique and exclusive designer fashions at JustFashionNow.

We believe fashion should be personal and diversified. Every female has her own style, we respect and appreciate the differences, with that idea in mind, we will deliver more rich and colorful fashion styles to customers!

description:
NORACORA is an international B2C online fashion shopping destination. In recent years, we are developing globally at a rapid pace, winning recognition and trust from customers throughout America, Europe, and Australia.

Our Mission

While our main intention is women’s wear, NORACORA also offers various men’s styles, accessories, shoes, bags, and other trending items. Our goal is to have a wide variety of high quality, fashionable products at low prices. NORACORA offers fashion-forward styles and innovative designs all delivered with a truly class-leading professional service that all our customers deserve.

Now we are looking for you to join in NORACORA affiliate program to help us grow faster. That you love fashion as we do and may be proud of being with us together.

• New monthly profitable activities , updating banners and coupons.

name: Lilicloth WW
name_aliases: lilicloth, lilycloth, lily, kbkb, лили, лиликлос, дшдшсдщер
description:
Lilicloth is an online shopping platform which offers a wide range of products from beautifully printed dresses and tops to t-shirts and accessories in a wide range of styles at the lowest prices. With several years of experience in clothing design, we are committed to providing absolutely the best set of clothes to touch your skin.

Our clothes can be so much more than what they appear to be; it is a new way to discover and to express yourself, your true self. Here at Lilicloth, we hope to inspire you to revamp your wardrobe and have the confidence show who you really are, all at an affordable price. This is why we offer clothing for men and women regardless of age or body type because we believe that our customers shouldn’t have to change who they are to be beautiful and confident.

Each item is carefully designed and printed by our passionate and skilled designers equipped with the most advanced equipment to ensure that your Lilicloth experience is both seamless and exhilarating.

Each product at Lilicloth has been hand selected by our team of supervisors to make sure it is worthy of our customers, who deserve the best and only the best. We hope to broaden our audience so that Lilicloth can continue to inspire more people to express themselves through fashion.

Now we are looking for you to join in Lilicloth affiliate program to help us grow faster. That you love fashion as we do and may be proud of being with us together.

Advantages for publishers:
• New monthly profitable activities , updating banners and coupons.
• Newsletters when new activity and promotions update.
• Free to join

name: Roselinlin WW
description:
ROSELINLIN is an international B2C online fashion shopping destination.
Founded in 2016, in past years, ROSELINLIN has achieved rapid development on a global scale,and we have won recognition and trust from customers in America, Europe, Australia. 
The company mainly focuses on women's wear, but it also offers accessories, shoes, bags and other fashion items.
Our goal is always to provide our customers with stunning, high quality fashion products at down to earth prices. ROSELINLIN offers trending fashion-forward styles, edgy and innovative designs all delivered with a truly class-leading professional service.

As a global online shopping destination, we understand the passion our customers have by providing a wide range of high quality clothing styles at factory direct prices along with a dedicated professional service to customers all over the world. With thousands of affordable products lines, our buyers share our passion with their total commitment to procuring the very best in showcase clothing and accessories at the most competitive prices.

Advantages for publishers:
• New monthly profitable activities , updating banners and coupons.
• Newsletters when new activity and promotions update.

At Govee, creating high-quality LED lighting and smart home devices is our core priority. We diligently strive to provide you with groundbreaking products that help illuminate your greatest moments in dynamic color.

We create cutting-edge LED lights and smart home devices that transform traditional ways of living.

We value innovativeness and will continue providing excellent customer service while creating colorful and safe products that succeed in Making Life Smarter.

name: Shopsy App [CPS] IN
description:
Company Description: Shopsy online shopping app offers the trendiest items in fashion, the best in mobiles, top-branded electronics at wholesale prices. Shop top-notch quality items at Up To 80% Off; Fashion starting at Rs. 149, Beauty starting Rs. 49, top-branded Mobiles starting Rs. 639, and Electronics starting Rs. 88!
Enjoy the best online shopping experience with a high-profit margin on each order. Find exclusive fashion products and shop for the best style & trends across top brands. Shopsy provides you with a complete wardrobe solution where you can shop from curated capsules collections on the app. Also, enjoy free shipping on women’s fashion.

Follow these easy steps to earn money online using Shopsy Online Shopping App:

1. Browse - Download the Shopsy app; browse through the largest selection of products at best prices & offers from Flipkart's most-trusted suppliers across categories like fashion, electronics, and more.
2. Order - Once you or your contacts like something, place an order on the Shopsy app. Our reliable Flipkart delivery systems will ensure that the customer receives the order within 7 working days.
3. Earn - We will transfer your earned margin to your account once the order matures.

Campaign Description: Shopsy provides an opportunity for the publisher to earn commission every time a customer buys something on the shopsy app through admitad's affiliate link.

Target Geo: PAN India

name: Joom RU
description:
Джум —  это международный маркетплейс для покупок товаров со всего мира. Наша миссия помогать людям сделать процесс покупок легким, развлекательным и открыть безграничный доступ к качественным товарам. Компания Джум была основана в июне 2016 года в Риге, Латвия. Сегодня маркетплейс входит в международную группу компаний Joom, офисы которой расположены в Латвии, Китае, Гонконге, США, Германии, Люксембурге и России.

Портрет ЦА:

Компания не ориентирована на конкретную целевую аудиторию по возрасту или полу, что позволяет нам быть гибкими и открытыми для разных групп клиентов.

Преимущества работы для веб-мастеров:


	Известный бренд
	Возможность создавать свои креативы
	Большая доля апрува
	Широкое гео


Преимущества работы для клиентов:


	Миллионы товаров из Китая, Кореи, Японии и Турции
	Персонализированные подборки
	Внутренняя социальная сеть
	Собственная логистика



	Как проходит сверка:
	Раз в месяц с 1-14 число, авто
	Данные об ОРД ККТУ 7.1.1
	Выдача промокодов: есть возможность выдачи именных промокодов по запросу
	Информация про модерацию
	на стороне Admitad

name: Info Store (EN)
name_aliases: inf, info, infostore, infstore, info estore, infe story
description:
ABOUT THE COMPANY
The Info Store Group was born with technology in its DNA, working with the purpose of providing the best of it to its customers via the online store and a Connect Center for calls via WhatsApp and telephone, in addition to two Technical Assistance also in Manaus.

Grupo Info Store is also responsible for the Samsung and Motorola franchises in the northern region, totaling twenty points spread across the states of Acre, Amazonas, Pará, Rondônia and Roraima.

In 2022, AMZ Tech was also inaugurated, a unit focused on B2B businesses, offering the broad catalogue, vast inventory and facilities that only the more than twenty years of expertise of Grupo Info Store could offer. Today, offering complete experiences in stores and beyond has become a priority for the Group, complementing the best technology mix with a variety of services, such as payment facilities, insurance, RenovaTech, service cards, mobile recharges and much more.

name: Cleaning Superstore UAE
name_aliases: cleaning, cleaning superstore, store, cleaning store, clening, cleeing
description:
Program Description (English)

Cleaning Superstore UAE is the first and largest retail and wholesale destination in the UAE dedicated exclusively to cleaning products and household essentials.
With over 3,000 products available both online and in our Ajman and Abu Dhabi megastores, we supply everything from detergents and cleaning tools to industrial-grade chemicals and hygiene solutions.

We offer wholesale prices, factory-direct and refill stations for cleaning chemicals — making cleaning more efficient and affordable for homes, offices, and businesses across the UAE.

 

4. Company Profile

Industry: Cleaning & Household Supplies
Products/Services:
Cleaning chemicals, washroom care, laundry care, kitchen care, waste management, paper products, disposables, janitorial tools, home organizing, personal care, pest control products, shop by carton, industrial chemicals

Locations: Ajman & Abu Dhabi, UAE
Online: www.cleaningsuperstore.com

 

5. Brand Keywords (Protected Terms)

Do not use the following in contextual or search ads:


	
	Cleaning Superstore
	 
	
	
	CleaningSuperstore.com
	 
	
	
	Cleaning Super Store
	 
	
	
	CleaningSuperstore UAE
	 
	
	
	Cleaning Superstore App
	 
	
	
	Any misspellings or variations thereof
	


 

6. Customer Benefits


	
	Factory-direct wholesale prices
	 
	
	
	Over 3,000 cleaning and hygiene products
	 
	
	
	UAE’s first cleaning product superstore
	 
	
	
	Refill stations for cleaning chemicals
	 
	
	
	Fast delivery across all Emirates
	 
	
	
	Online store + mobile app + retail megastores
	 
	
	
	Trusted B2B and B2C supplier
	 
	
	
	Global brands & Industrial-grade quality
	 
	


7. Target Audience Portrait


	
	Gender: All
	 
	
	
	Age: 25–55
	 
	
	
	Income: Middle to upper income
	 
	
	
	Occupation: Homeowners, business owners, cleaning companies, facility managers, procurement teams
	 
	
	
	Location: UAE (Ajman, Abu Dhabi, Dubai, Sharjah, and other Emirates)
	 
	
	
	Segment: B2B and B2C customers seeking quality cleaning solutions
	 
	


8. Popular Products


	
	Multi-surface and floor cleaners
	 
	
	
	Laundry detergents and dishwashing liquids
	 
	
	
	Disinfectants and sanitizers
	 
	
	
	Paper and hygiene products
	 
	
	
	Cleaning tools (mops, buckets, squeegees, etc.)
	 
	
	
	Refills and bulk chemicals
	 
	
	
	Industrial-grade cleaning products
	 
	


9. Brand Positioning Tips

Should emphasize:


	
	“UAE’s No.1 Cleaning Supplies Superstore”
	 
	
	
	“Wholesale Prices, Direct from Factory”
	 
	
	
	“3,000+ Cleaning & Hygiene Products”
	 
	
	
	“Refill Stations in Ajman & Abu Dhabi”
	 
	
	
	“Trusted by Homes & Businesses Alike”
	 
	


Avoid misleading terms like “official distributor of X brand” unless confirmed by our marketing team.

 

10. Negative Keywords List

Exclude from contextual ads:

free cheap cleaning jobs

cleaning employment

janitor hiring used products counterfeit / fake 

Cleaning Superstore (brand term)
